titles.title: Civilian Prisoner-of-War Medal Act of 2005

To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the issuance of a prisoner-of-war medal to civilian employees of the Federal Government who are taken captive, by armed forces or agents of a foreign government hostile to the United States, during war or under wartime conditions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/19/2005--Introduced. Civilian Prisoner-of-War Medal Act of 2005 - Provides for the issuance by the President of a prisoner-of-war medal to civilian employees of the federal government who are forcibly taken and held captive by armed forces or agents of a foreign government hostile to the United States.
